title: .ameba.yml
description: Configuration rules for the Crystal language Ameba linter

Globs.title: Globbed files and paths
Globs.description: An array of wildcards (or paths) to include to the inspection

Excluded.title: Excluded files and paths
Excluded.description: An array of wildcards (or paths) to exclude from the source list

Version.description: The version of Ameba to limit rules to

Formatter.description: The formatter to use for Ameba

Documentation/Documentation.title: Documentation/Documentation
Documentation/Documentation.description: Enforces public types to be documented

Layout/LineLength.title: Layout/LineLength
Layout/LineLength.description: Disallows lines longer than `MaxLength` number of symbols

Lint/DuplicateWhenCondition.title: Lint/DuplicateWhenCondition
Lint/DuplicateWhenCondition.description: Reports repeated conditions used in case `when` expressions

Lint/ElseNil.title: Lint/ElseNil
Lint/ElseNil.description: Disallows `else` blocks with `nil` as their body

Lint/HashDuplicatedKey.title: Lint/HashDuplicatedKey
Lint/HashDuplicatedKey.description: Disallows duplicated keys in hash literals

Lint/LiteralAssignmentsInExpressions.title: Lint/LiteralAssignmentsInExpressions
Lint/LiteralAssignmentsInExpressions.description: Disallows assignments with literal values in control expressions

Lint/LiteralInCondition.title: Lint/LiteralInCondition
Lint/LiteralInCondition.description: Disallows useless conditional statements that contain a literal in place of a variable or predicate function

Lint/MissingBlockArgument.title: Lint/MissingBlockArgument
Lint/MissingBlockArgument.description: Disallows yielding method definitions without block argument

Lint/NotNilAfterNoBang.title: Lint/NotNilAfterNoBang
Lint/NotNilAfterNoBang.description: Identifies usage of `index/rindex/find/match` calls followed by `not_nil!`

Lint/PercentArrays.title: Lint/PercentArrays
Lint/PercentArrays.description: Disallows some unwanted symbols in percent array literals

Lint/RedundantStringCoercion.title: Lint/RedundantStringCoercion
Lint/RedundantStringCoercion.description: Disallows redundant string conversions in interpolation

Lint/RequireParentheses.title: Lint/RequireParentheses
Lint/RequireParentheses.description: Disallows method calls with no parentheses and a logical operator in the argument list

Lint/SelfInitializeDefinition.title: Lint/SelfInitializeDefinition
Lint/SelfInitializeDefinition.description: Reports `initialize` method definitions with a `self` receiver

Lint/ShadowedException.title: Lint/ShadowedException
Lint/ShadowedException.description: Disallows rescued exception that get shadowed

Lint/ShadowingOuterLocalVar.title: Lint/ShadowingOuterLocalVar
Lint/ShadowingOuterLocalVar.description: Disallows the usage of the same name as outer local variables for block or proc arguments

Lint/SpecFilename.title: Lint/SpecFilename
Lint/SpecFilename.description: Enforces spec filenames to have `_spec` suffix

Lint/TopLevelOperatorDefinition.title: Lint/TopLevelOperatorDefinition
Lint/TopLevelOperatorDefinition.description: Disallows top level operator method definitions

Lint/Typos.title: Lint/Typos
Lint/Typos.description: Reports typos found in source files

Lint/UnneededDisableDirective.title: Lint/UnneededDisableDirective
Lint/UnneededDisableDirective.description: Reports unneeded disable directives in comments

Lint/UselessVisibilityModifier.title: Lint/UselessVisibilityModifier
Lint/UselessVisibilityModifier.description: Disallows top level `protected` method visibility modifier

Lint/VoidOutsideLib.title: Lint/VoidOutsideLib
Lint/VoidOutsideLib.description: Disallows use of `Void` outside C lib bindings and `Pointer(Void)`

Lint/WhitespaceAroundMacroExpression.title: Lint/WhitespaceAroundMacroExpression
Lint/WhitespaceAroundMacroExpression.description: Reports missing spaces around macro expressions

Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity.title: Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity
Metrics/CyclomaticComplexity.description: Disallows methods with a cyclomatic complexity higher than `MaxComplexity`

Naming/AccessorMethodName.title: Naming/AccessorMethodName
Naming/AccessorMethodName.description: Makes sure that accessor methods are named properly

Naming/BinaryOperatorParameterName.title: Naming/BinaryOperatorParameterName
Naming/BinaryOperatorParameterName.description: Enforces that certain binary operator methods have their sole parameter name standardized

Naming/ConstantNames.title: Naming/ConstantNames
Naming/ConstantNames.description: Enforces constant names to be in screaming case

Naming/Filename.title: Naming/Filename
Naming/Filename.description: Enforces file names to be in underscored case

Naming/MethodNames.title: Naming/MethodNames
Naming/MethodNames.description: Enforces method names to be in underscored case

Naming/QueryBoolMethods.title: Naming/QueryBoolMethods
Naming/QueryBoolMethods.description: Reports boolean properties without the `?` suffix

Naming/RescuedExceptionsVariableName.title: Naming/RescuedExceptionsVariableName
Naming/RescuedExceptionsVariableName.description: Makes sure that rescued exceptions variables are named as expected

Naming/TypeNames.title: Naming/TypeNames
Naming/TypeNames.description: Enforces type names in camelcase manner

Naming/VariableNames.title: Naming/VariableNames
Naming/VariableNames.description: Enforces variable names to be in underscored case

Performance/AnyAfterFilter.title: Performance/AnyAfterFilter
Performance/AnyAfterFilter.description: Identifies usage of `any?` calls that follow filters

Performance/ChainedCallWithNoBang.title: Performance/ChainedCallWithNoBang
Performance/ChainedCallWithNoBang.description: Identifies usage of chained calls not utilizing the bang method variants

Performance/CompactAfterMap.title: Performance/CompactAfterMap
Performance/CompactAfterMap.description: Identifies usage of `compact` calls that follow `map`

Performance/ExcessiveAllocations.title: Performance/ExcessiveAllocations
Performance/ExcessiveAllocations.description: Identifies usage of excessive collection allocations

Performance/FirstLastAfterFilter.title: Performance/FirstLastAfterFilter
Performance/FirstLastAfterFilter.description: Identifies usage of `first/last/first?/last?` calls that follow filters

Performance/FlattenAfterMap.title: Performance/FlattenAfterMap
Performance/FlattenAfterMap.description: Identifies usage of `flatten` calls that follow `map`

Performance/MapInsteadOfBlock.title: Performance/MapInsteadOfBlock
Performance/MapInsteadOfBlock.description: Identifies usage of `sum/product` calls that follow `map`

Performance/MinMaxAfterMap.title: Performance/MinMaxAfterMap
Performance/MinMaxAfterMap.description: Identifies usage of `min/max/minmax` calls that follow `map`

Performance/SizeAfterFilter.title: Performance/SizeAfterFilter
Performance/SizeAfterFilter.description: Identifies usage of `size` calls that follow filter

Style/ArrayLiteralSyntax.title: Style/ArrayLiteralSyntax
Style/ArrayLiteralSyntax.description: Encourages the use of `Array(T).new` over `[] of T`

Style/GuardClause.title: Style/GuardClause
Style/GuardClause.description: Check for conditionals that can be replaced with guard clauses

Style/HashLiteralSyntax.title: Style/HashLiteralSyntax
Style/HashLiteralSyntax.description: Encourages the use of `Hash(K, V).new` over `{} of K => V`

Style/HeredocEscape.title: Style/HeredocEscape
Style/HeredocEscape.description: Recommends using the heredoc variant that escapes interpolation or control chars in a heredoc body

Style/HeredocIndent.title: Style/HeredocIndent
Style/HeredocIndent.description: Recommends heredoc bodies are indented consistently

Style/IsAFilter.title: Style/IsAFilter
Style/IsAFilter.description: Identifies usage of `is_a?/nil?` calls within filters

Style/IsANil.title: Style/IsANil
Style/IsANil.description: Disallows calls to `is_a?(Nil)` in favor of `nil?`

Style/LargeNumbers.title: Style/LargeNumbers
Style/LargeNumbers.description: Disallows usage of large numbers without underscore

Style/MultilineCurlyBlock.title: Style/MultilineCurlyBlock
Style/MultilineCurlyBlock.description: Disallows multi-line blocks using curly block syntax

Style/MultilineStringLiteral.title: Style/MultilineStringLiteral
Style/MultilineStringLiteral.description: Disallows multiline string literals not using `<<-HEREDOC` markers

Style/ParenthesesAroundCondition.title: Style/ParenthesesAroundCondition
Style/ParenthesesAroundCondition.description: Disallows redundant parentheses around control expressions

Style/PercentLiteralDelimiters.title: Style/PercentLiteralDelimiters
Style/PercentLiteralDelimiters.description: Enforces the consistent usage of `%`-literal delimiters

Style/UnlessElse.title: Style/UnlessElse
Style/UnlessElse.description: Disallows the use of an `else` block with the `unless`

Style/VerboseBlock.title: Style/VerboseBlock
Style/VerboseBlock.description: Identifies usage of collapsible single expression blocks

Style/WhileTrue.title: Style/WhileTrue
Style/WhileTrue.description: Disallows `while` statements with a `true` literal as condition

Typing/MacroCallArgumentTypeRestriction.title: Typing/MacroCallArgumentTypeRestriction
Typing/MacroCallArgumentTypeRestriction.description: Recommends that call arguments to certain macros have type restrictions

Typing/MethodParameterTypeRestriction.title: Typing/MethodParameterTypeRestriction
Typing/MethodParameterTypeRestriction.description: Recommends that method parameters have type restrictions

Typing/MethodReturnTypeRestriction.title: Typing/MethodReturnTypeRestriction
Typing/MethodReturnTypeRestriction.description: Recommends that methods have a return type restriction

Typing/ProcLiteralReturnTypeRestriction.title: Typing/ProcLiteralReturnTypeRestriction
Typing/ProcLiteralReturnTypeRestriction.description: Disallows proc literals without return type restriction
